title: Position Updater Script - On Being Referenced

Description.value: Updates the positions status to 'Full' after being referenced by a sample.

value.scriptCode:
# Get the entity where this script is embedded (the 'Sample' instance)
sample_entity = seal.get_containing_entity()
print(f"Script running on Sample entity: {sample_entity.get('title')} (ID: {sample_entity['id']})")

# Initialize a flag to track if the position update was successful
position_update_successful = False

# Get the 'Position' reference field
position_field = sample_entity["fields"].get("Position")

if not position_field or not position_field.get("value"):
    # If the 'Position' field is empty or doesn't exist, print a message and exit
    print("The 'Position' reference field is empty or not found. No action taken.")
else:
    # Assume 'Position' is a single reference field. Get the first reference.
    position_ref = position_field["value"][0]
    position_entity_id = position_ref["id"]
    print(f"Referenced Position entity ID: {position_entity_id}")

    # Get the current state of the Position entity
    current_position_entity = seal.get_entity(entity_id=position_entity_id)

    # Make the Position entity editable (create a new draft) if not already
    if current_position_entity["status"] == "EDITABLE":
        print(f"Position entity {current_position_entity.get('title')} is already in draft.")
        position_draft_id = current_position_entity["id"]
    else:
        print(f"Putting Position entity {current_position_entity.get('title')} into draft...")
        new_position_draft = seal.make_entity_editable(position_entity_id)
        position_draft_id = new_position_draft["id"]
        print(f"Position entity is now in draft. New draft ID: {position_draft_id}")

    # Update the 'Status' select field in the Position instance to 'Full'
    print(f"Updating 'Status' field of Position entity {position_draft_id} to 'Full'...")
    seal.update_field_value_in_entity(
        entity_id=position_draft_id,
        field_name="Status",
        field_value=["Full"] # Select fields expect a list of strings
    )
    print("Successfully updated 'Status' field.")

    # Get the change set information for the containing 'Sample' entity
    sample_change_set = seal.get_change_set_for_containing_entity()

    if not sample_change_set:
        print("The Sample entity is not part of a change set. Cannot add Position entity.")
    else:
        change_set_index = sample_change_set["index"]
        print(f"Sample entity is in Change Set: {change_set_index}")

        # Add the Position draft entity to the Sample's change set
        print(f"Adding Position draft ({position_draft_id}) to Change Set {change_set_index}...")
        seal.add_entity_to_change_set(position_draft_id, change_set_index)
        print("Position entity successfully added to the Sample's change set.")
        position_update_successful = True # Set flag to True as all steps completed

# Check the Sample's checkbox field if the position update was successful
if position_update_successful:
    print("All position updates completed. Checking 'Position Status Updated to Full?' checkbox on Sample.")
    seal.update_field_value(
        field_name="Position Status Updated to Full?",
        field_value=True
    )
    print("Checkbox 'Position Status Updated to Full?' updated on Sample.")
